name: Garbage Collector (profPillow, theslackingcat)
description:
In the Spirit of the  Watch + Jam 3: This Time It's Garbage game jam,  we have made a garbage collecting game.

You play as a sentient garbage bin collecting various fallen garbage... but be careful!
You'll want to avoid certain garbage items!

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Instruction:

Use left and right arrow keys to move
Banana's stun you  
Cans make you lose points
Fish give you a speed boost
All other items give you points.

Tell us your highest score in the comments!

(If you get past 25 you'll have beaten the game devs highest score!)

____________________________________________________________________________________________
